name: 洪媽益
objective:
本課程涵蓋的主題包含語音，句法，語意，心理語言，社會語言，語言學習等簡介，作為更進一步語言（母語／外語）學習，教學，研究的基礎。
This course covers the basic ideas on the following sub-topics: phonetics & phonology, syntax, semantics, psycholinguistics, sociolinguistics and language acquisition, serving as a stepping stone for further research on language learning (native or foreign), teaching or other language-related study.
schedule:
Feb 20 Orientation
Feb 21/27 Introduction
March 6 Animal communication vs. language
March 7/13/14 Brain and language 
March 20/21/27 Morphology
March 28 First Midterm Exam
April 10/11/17/19 Syntax
April 24/25/May 1/2 Phonetics
May 8/9/15/16 Phonology
May 22 Second Midterm Exam
May 23/29/June 5 Semantics
June 6/12/13 Pragmatics
June 19 Final Exam
END
scorePolicy:
Exams: 50% (March 28, May 22, June 19)
Exercises and Quizzes: 40%
Attendance: 10%
END
materials: Language Files 13th edition. The Ohio State University Press. ISBN: 978957445999-5
consultation: Office hours: Mondays and Tuesdays 1-3pmEmail me (miguelntut@gmail.com) to set an appointment.
